comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content: The tall women in the center looking directly at the camera is noted British actress Ellen Terry. She was the great aunt of actor Sir John Gielgud.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Beatrice Forbes-Robertson Hale (1883-1967), actress, suffragist, author: www.stagebeauty.net/th-frames.html?http&&&www... Evelyn Garnaut Smalley (d. 1938) of New York; born in London to American parents who were friends of Henry James. She was awarded a Croix de Guerre for bravery during WWI, for her work with the YMCA at Bouy. She edited the Henry James Yearbook (1923). champagne1418.pagesperso-orange.fr/recit/recit9.htm
